mn137:9.3: Cha gehasitani somanassani, cha nekkhammasitani somanassani, cha gehasitani domanassani, cha nekkhammasitani domanassani, cha gehasita upekkha, cha nekkhammasita upekkha.
mn137:10.2: Cakkhuvinneyyanam rupanam itthanam kantanam manapanam manoramanam lokamisapatisamyuttanam patilabham va patilabhato samanupassato pubbe va patiladdhapubbam atitam niruddham viparinatam samanussarato uppajjati somanassam.
mn137:10.3: Yam evarupam somanassam idam vuccati gehasitam somanassam.
mn137:10.8: manovinneyyanam dhammanam itthanam kantanam manapanam …pe… somanassam.
mn137:10.9: Yam evarupam somanassam idam vuccati gehasitam somanassam.
mn137:11.2: Rupanam tveva aniccatam viditva viparinamaviraganirodham, ‘pubbe ceva rupa etarahi ca sabbe te rupa anicca dukkha viparinamadhamma’ti evametam yathabhutam sammappannaya passato uppajjati somanassam.

mn137:13.3: ‘kudassu namaham tadayatanam upasampajja viharissami yadariya etarahi ayatanam upasampajja viharanti’ti iti anuttaresu vimokkhesu piham upatthapayato uppajjati pihapaccaya domanassam.

mn137:16.3: Tatra, bhikkhave, yani cha nekkhammasitani somanassani tani nissaya tani agamma yani cha gehasitani somanassani tani pajahatha, tani samatikkamatha.
mn137:16.4: Evametesam pahanam hoti, evametesam samatikkamo hoti.
mn137:16.5: Tatra, bhikkhave, yani cha nekkhammasitani domanassani tani nissaya tani agamma yani cha gehasitani domanassani tani pajahatha, tani samatikkamatha.
mn137:16.6: Evametesam pahanam hoti, evametesam samatikkamo hoti.
mn137:16.7: Tatra, bhikkhave, ya cha nekkhammasita upekkha ta nissaya ta agamma, ya cha gehasita upekkha ta pajahatha ta samatikkamatha.
mn137:16.8: Evametasam pahanam hoti, evametasam samatikkamo hoti.
mn137:16.9: Tatra, bhikkhave, yani cha nekkhammasitani somanassani tani nissaya tani agamma yani cha nekkhammasitani domanassani tani pajahatha, tani samatikkamatha.

mn137:17.1: Atthi, bhikkhave, upekkha nanatta nanattasita, atthi upekkha ekatta ekattasita.
mn137:18.1: Katama ca, bhikkhave, upekkha nanatta nanattasita?
mn137:18.2: Atthi, bhikkhave, upekkha rupesu, atthi saddesu, atthi gandhesu, atthi rasesu, atthi photthabbesu—
mn137:19.1: Katama ca, bhikkhave, upekkha ekatta ekattasita?
mn137:19.2: Atthi, bhikkhave, upekkha akasanancayatananissita, atthi vinnanancayatananissita, atthi akincannayatananissita, atthi nevasannanasannayatananissita—
mn137:20.1: Tatra, bhikkhave, yayam upekkha ekatta ekattasita tam nissaya tam agamma yayam upekkha nanatta nanattasita tam pajahatha, tam samatikkamatha.
mn137:20.2: Evametissa pahanam hoti, evametissa samatikkamo hoti.
mn137:20.3: Atammayatam, bhikkhave, nissaya atammayatam agamma yayam upekkha ekatta ekattasita tam pajahatha, tam samatikkamatha.
mn137:20.4: Evametissa pahanam hoti, evametissa samatikkamo hoti.

mn137:21.1: ‘Tayo satipatthana yadariyo sevati, yadariyo sevamano sattha ganamanusasitumarahati’ti—
mn137:22.1: Idha, bhikkhave, sattha savakanam dhammam deseti anukampako hitesi anukampam upadaya:
mn137:22.3: Tassa savaka na sussusanti, na sotam odahanti, na anna cittam upatthapenti, vokkamma ca satthusasana vattanti.
mn137:22.4: Tatra, bhikkhave, tathagato na ceva anattamano hoti, na ca anattamanatam patisamvedeti, anavassuto ca viharati sato sampajano.
mn137:22.5: Idam, bhikkhave, pathamam satipatthanam yadariyo sevati, yadariyo sevamano sattha ganamanusasitumarahati.
mn137:23.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, sattha savakanam dhammam deseti anukampako hitesi anukampam upadaya:
mn137:23.3: Tassa ekacce savaka na sussusanti, na sotam odahanti, na anna cittam upatthapenti, vokkamma ca satthusasana vattanti;
mn137:23.4: ekacce savaka sussusanti, sotam odahanti, anna cittam upatthapenti, na ca vokkamma satthusasana vattanti.
mn137:23.5: Tatra, bhikkhave, tathagato na ceva anattamano hoti, na ca anattamanatam patisamvedeti;
mn137:23.6: na ca attamano hoti, na ca attamanatam patisamvedeti.
mn137:23.8: tadubhayam abhinivajjetva upekkhako viharati sato sampajano.
mn137:23.9: Idam vuccati, bhikkhave, dutiyam satipatthanam yadariyo sevati, yadariyo sevamano sattha ganamanusasitumarahati.
mn137:24.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, sattha savakanam dhammam deseti anukampako hitesi anukampam upadaya:
mn137:24.3: Tassa savaka sussusanti, sotam odahanti, annacittam upatthapenti, na ca vokkamma satthusasana vattanti.
mn137:24.4: Tatra, bhikkhave, tathagato attamano ceva hoti, attamanatanca patisamvedeti, anavassuto ca viharati sato sampajano.
mn137:24.5: Idam vuccati, bhikkhave, tatiyam satipatthanam yadariyo sevati, yadariyo sevamano sattha ganamanusasitumarahati.
mn137:24.6: ‘Tayo satipatthana yadariyo sevati, yadariyo sevamano sattha ganamanusasitumarahati’ti—
mn137:24.7: iti yam tam vuttam idametam paticca vuttam.
mn137:25.2: iti kho panetam vuttam. Kincetam paticca vuttam?
mn137:25.3: Hatthidamakena, bhikkhave, hatthidammo sarito ekamyeva disam dhavati—
mn137:25.4: puratthimam va pacchimam va uttaram va dakkhinam va.
mn137:26.1: Assadamakena, bhikkhave, assadammo sarito ekanneva disam dhavati—
mn137:26.2: puratthimam va pacchimam va uttaram va dakkhinam va.
mn137:26.3: Godamakena, bhikkhave, godammo sarito ekanneva disam dhavati—
mn137:26.4: puratthimam va pacchimam va uttaram va dakkhinam va.
mn137:26.5: Tathagatena hi, bhikkhave, arahata sammasambuddhena purisadammo sarito attha disa vidhavati.
mn137:27.7: sabbaso rupasannanam samatikkama patighasannanam atthangama nanattasannanam amanasikara ‘ananto akaso’ti akasanancayatanam upasampajja viharati—
mn137:27.9: sabbaso akasanancayatanam samatikkamma ‘anantam vinnanan’ti vinnanancayatanam upasampajja viharati—
mn137:27.11: sabbaso vinnanancayatanam samatikkamma ‘natthi kinci’ti akincannayatanam upasampajja viharati—
mn137:27.13: sabbaso akincannayatanam samatikkamma nevasannanasannayatanam upasampajja viharati—
mn137:27.15: sabbaso nevasannanasannayatanam samatikkamma sannavedayitanirodham upasampajja viharati—
mn137:27.17: Tathagatena, bhikkhave, arahata sammasambuddhena purisadammo sarito ima attha disa vidhavati.
mn137:28.2: iti yam tam vuttam idametam paticca vuttan”ti.
mn137:28.4: Attamana te bhikkhu bhagavato bhasitam abhinandunti.
